metadata.title: USN-7182-1 -- Ceph vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Ceph incorrectly handled unsupported JWT algorithms in the RadosGW gateway. An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass certain authentication checks and restrictions.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7182-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ceph - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-base - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-common - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-exporter - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-fuse - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-grafana-dashboards - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-immutable-object-cache - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mds - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mgr - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mgr-cephadm - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mgr-dashboard - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mgr-diskprediction-local - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mgr-k8sevents - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mgr-modules-core - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mgr-rook - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-mon - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-osd - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-prometheus-alerts - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-resource-agents - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 ceph-volume - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 cephadm - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 cephfs-mirror - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 cephfs-shell - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 crimson-osd - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libcephfs-dev - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libcephfs-java - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libcephfs-jni - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libcephfs2 - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 librados-dev - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 librados2 - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libradospp-dev - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libradosstriper-dev - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libradosstriper1 - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 librbd-dev - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 librbd1 - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 librgw-dev - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 librgw2 - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libsqlite3-mod-ceph - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 libsqlite3-mod-ceph-dev - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 python3-ceph - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 python3-ceph-argparse - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 python3-ceph-common - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 python3-cephfs - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 python3-rados - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 python3-rbd - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 python3-rgw - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 rados-objclass-dev - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 radosgw - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 rbd-fuse - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 rbd-mirror - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 rbd-nbd - 19.2.0-0ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
